about_the_game:
Discover The Greenhouse

Step into the world of The Greenhouse with captivating liminal spaces, intriguing puzzles, and subtle storytelling that define the entire game. Unravel the greenhouse's enigmatic tale by uncovering hidden clues and hints.

Explore

Dive into stunning botanical gardens and modern architecture brought to life with responsive physics and dynamic lighting. Traverse deep water and dense foliage, where every step feels grounded and real. As you journey through every corner, snapshots are automatically added to your photo album, helping you track the areas you’ve explored.

Interact

Engage with objects to evoke your sixth sense, uncovering memories and clues left behind by past visitors. Some objects are connected to nature, granting you the power to control the weather. Seamlessly shift between rain and sunshine, dramatically altering the atmosphere around you.

Choose Your Challenge: Walk or Survive

By default, the game offers a more serene walking simulator experience through eerie liminal spaces. For a heart-pounding twist, activate Entities to intensify the gameplay. Ghosts, insects, and the Groundskeeper can each be enabled individually, bringing unique threats. Arm yourself with bug spray to ward off deadly insects, and if you encounter the Groundskeeper, run for your life!

Escape

Once a vibrant attraction, this amusement park's unnerving modern art and lush botanical glasshouses now form a labyrinth of corridors, art galleries, and gardens. Lose yourself in its twists and turns, but don’t forget to strategically pick up and drop objects to mark your path and find your way to freedom.

Save your Journey

Save and load your progress whenever you need, with the game automatically capturing your milestones at key checkpoints.

name: Greenhouse

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (or later)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 (from 2017 or later)
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (or later)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 (from 2019 or later)
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT or newer
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Explore the eerie galleries and botanical spaces of the Greenhouse. Piece together the mystery ahead of the big reveal. Interact with optical art, illusions and weather effects. Turn on entities if you dare.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish, Ukrainian, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
